C = SN(d1) - Xe^(-rT) * N(d2)

where:

* C is the fair value of the option
* S is the current stock price
* N is the cumulative normal distribution function
* d1 and d2 are defined as:

d1 = ln(S/X) + (r + 0.5 * σ² * T)
